production quality and animations are a 10/10, character designs rlly good especially on futaro :D, character and romantic development rlly made sense and it was a fun ride. everything is not too much and u get harem ecchi feels, romance drama feels, slice of life feels, and school romance feels all in one anime. romcoms usually have boring parts but ig its just because theres 5 of them so we're always fueled up with romance and development every now and then so it never gets boring. Even if the plot is literally still the same as what the synopsis says for 2 whole seasons we never get bored and development comes so smoothly. even tho its pretty light it attached to me pretty well. didnt rlly dislike anything about the anime except for the fact that it would be sad if he didnt go down the harem route which is impossible due to the setting. a solid 9/10
